channel.title: Dailies on Opinionated Guides
channel.description: Recent content in Dailies on Opinionated Guides

item.description: Day 1 # :root { --body-background: #f5f5f5; --text-color: #020202; --link-color: #009cdf; } body,p { color: var(--text-color); } body{ background: var(--body-background); color: var(--text-color); } h1{ text-shadow: none!important; } h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,nav{ text-align: left!important; text-shadow: none!important; } h2{ border-bottom: 1px solid #aaaaaa; } a{ color: var(--link-color); } aside nav ul li, .navbak{ font-size: 14px !important; color: var(--body-background); } img{ } span{ color: var(--text-color); } nav{ background: #0000 !important; //This makes the BG of the nav invible } .
